t: What is brand preference, and why does it matter? | Amazon Ads
s: March 22, 2023 - Brand preference is when a customer identifies a preferred product and makes that brand a part of their regular purchasing routine. This might come after a consumer tests other products—trying out the competition but ultimately settling on one prevailing brand.

t: Would you buy an expensive brand product on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): It depends on what it is. However I would not buy it just because it had a brand name. I would at the reviews and look at peoples satisfaction with the product, I would look at manufacturers warranty, product quality etc before making a decision. Last I would look at similar item...

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
